LL a=10000000;
const LL mod=1e9+7;
int main()
{
	//freopen("test1.in","r",stdin);
	//freopen("test1.out","w",stdout);
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	LL tmp=n/a;
	LL tmm=n%a;
	last=biao[tmp];
	now=biao[tmp];
	bool o=1;
	if(n==1)
	{
		cout<<0<<endl;
		return 0;
	}
	if(n==2)
	{
		cout<<1<<endl;
		return 0;
	}
	bool bj=0;
	if(n<a)
	{
		bj=1;
		now=1;
	}
	int b=tmp*a%mod;
	for(int i=0;i<=tmm;i++)
	{
		if(bj&&i<=1)continue;
		now=(last%mod)*((i+b)%mod)%mod;
		if(o==1)
		{
			now+=1;
		}
		else
		{
			now-=1;
		}
		now=(now+mod)%mod;
		o=!o;
		last=now;
		//if(i%a==0)printf("%lld,",now%mod);
	}
	printf("%lld",now%mod);
	return 0;
}
